abstract: Comcast and Insight Communications have agreed to end a cable partnership in four states because Comcast wants to add a source of cash flow.
snippet: Comcast and Insight Communications have agreed to end a cable partnership in four states because Comcast wants to add a source of cash flow.
lead_paragraph: The cable television company Comcast and Insight Communications have agreed to end a cable partnership in four states because Comcast wants to add a source of cash flow.

headline.main: Comcast, Cash in Mind, Ends Partnership
headline.print_headline: Comcast, Cash in Mind, Ends Partnership

abstract: San Mateo, Calif.-based Vyatta picked up $11 million in a second round of funding, the software company said Monday. The round was led by Comcast Interactive Capital, which may use Vyatta’s technology in new potential managed service bundles for small and medium-sized business and enterprise markets. Also in the round were J.P. Morgan Partners, ComVentures and ArrowPath Venture Partners.
lead_paragraph: San Mateo, Calif.-based Vyatta picked up $11 million in a second round of funding, the software company said Monday. The round was led by Comcast Interactive Capital, which may use Vyatta’s technology in new potential managed service bundles for small and medium-sized business and enterprise markets. Also in the round were J.P. Morgan Partners, ComVentures and ArrowPath Venture Partners.

headline.main: Vyatta Nabs $11 Million in Second Round
